channel.title: Duelist's Aura
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Duelist's Aura" - Does the Duelist's Aura stack?

item.title: Re: Duelist's Aura
item.content:encoded: Nope, looks like its in my perm items list. For Duelist Eye, it says that I already have it. Very strange.

item.title: Re: Duelist's Aura
item.content:encoded:
@Anon: You're assuming that it can be traded, though. It can't.

@kibichan: My screen is saying that I already own it. Have you checked your inventory list of Permanent items to make sure? Perhaps you bought it on a different account, or accidently sold it?

item.title: Re: Duelist's Aura
item.content:encoded:
it doesn't stack, unless you mean one is duelists aura and onne is deulist eye.

maybe you sold your old one? accidents happen.

if you get it, and it doesn't stack, you can always trade it.

item.title: Re: Duelist's Aura
item.content:encoded: I doubt it. No other duplicated permanent items stack.

item.title: Duelist's Aura
item.content:encoded: I already bought one Duelist's Aura from the Arena, but its allowing me to buy a second and makes no mention of the fact that I already own the item. Does this item stack?
